name: Five Nights At Scratch
description:
This is the first installment of FNAS, Five Nights At Scratch. After a popular restaurant closes down for animatronic behavioral issues a new one arises, Scratch Cats Fisheria, a fish and chips place with arcades, good food and many cool play rooms. The problem is, it needs security, thats where you come in.

Controls:

Mouse to scroll side to side in the office, click the bottom button to open camera, click different camera buttons to view their respective cameras, same bottom button to close camera, green / red button in cams to close ventilation to the office (hold button), and red buttons above the door and window in the office to close them.
